channel.title: Enigma | CS Club @ MEC
channel.description: Recent content on Enigma | CS Club @ MEC

item.title: Mozilla WebExtension Hackathon
item.description: 24 hours to code. 200+ participants with one goal: to make the best possible add-on possible. Undergrads from all over the city aided by Mozilla mentors throughout the event were able to see their ideas become reality on 28th to 29th September, 2018. The location is Mahindra Ecole Centrale, an Engineering College in Hyderabad and the organizing committee included 5 admins of Enigma, The CS Club of the college. People started pouring in at 4 pm on Friday evening.
